name: JAD Tech Consulting
tag_list: requirements-definition, group-decision-facilitation, strategic-planning, application-development-or-selection, project-management, education-and-training
overview:
The JAD Tech team provides experienced professionals in all aspects of Joint Applications Development and application selection.

Every organization has challenges that require new thinking and solutions. By supporting a variety of clients across many industries — from NASA to the 1996 Olympics and Fortune 50 telecommunications corporations — the JAD Tech team has experienced many types of problems and has delivered solutions, often involving e-business applications.

The best approach is to begin with strategic planning — built on the Balanced Score Card methods. Generally, processes can be improved and business and data models captured in best-of-breed tools. What-if scenarios can be analyzed to select the optimum solution. From this point, whether it is to develop a custom solution, select an off-the-shelf solution to be modified, or to adapt the organization’s processes to the best-of-breed solution, the JAD Tech team can bring all of the decision-makers together to ensure the business returns are achieved.
